name: QUALIFIED DOCTORS
description: SQUARE Hospital aims to provide the highest possible level of care by the qualified consultants from India, Singapore, USA, UK & quality hospitals in the Middle East.

name: MEDICAL COUNSELING
description: Health and wellness counselors are individuals who provide clients with the tools and motivation necessary to accomplish their emotional and physical health goals.

name: EMERGENCY SERVICES
description: What is included in emergency medical services? Emergency medical services (EMS), also known as ambulance services or paramedic services, are emergency services that provide urgent pre-hospital treatment

name: OPERATION THEATER
description: Early dedicated rooms for surgical procedures were called OPERATING THEATRES because they literally were theatres, built in a gallery style for public observation.

name: EYE CARE
description: Primary eye care is the provision of appropriate, accessible, and affordable care that meets patients' eye care needs in a comprehensive and competent manner.

name: DIAGONSTIC TEST
description: A type of test used to help diagnose a disease or condition. Mammograms and colonoscopies are examples of diagnostic tests. Also called diagnostic procedure

name: BLOOD BANK
description: In 1937 Bernard Fantus, director of therapeutics at the Cook County Hospital in Chicago, established one of the first hospital blood banks in the United States.

name: FREE MEDICINE
description: In 1937 Bernard Fantus, director of therapeutics at the Cook County Hospital in Chicago, established one of the first hospital blood banks in the United States.
